item.description:
We've been neglecting our friends to the north, so it's time we ventured back into Hartford County. Sakura Garden in Glastonbury has a lot of fans and gets raves for its fresh sushi, sake selection and "new style sashimi". Also, their miso soup is delicious and apparently contains a special ingredient...Sakura Garden gets raves for its presentation and beautiful restaurant decor. Additionally, they feature hibachi, so if you have an interest in that, please mention it when you RSVP.

http://www.sakuragardencuisine.com/Glastonbury/aboutus.html

*** We collect a small fee of $1.00 per guest to offset the monthly charge for running the meetup. It is very much appreciated! ***

group.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group

item.name: Sakura Garden in Glastonbury
